title: tjtonmoy
author: tjtonmoy
created_time: November 07, 2023, 07:46:18 PMLast edit: November 08, 2023, 03:44:32 PM by tjtonmoy
content: Yeah, you heard me right. Today I was scrolling through some Instagram Reels and I saw a video of a person saying this. I'm still confused. Should I laugh or should I feel sorry for that person? So here's how the whole video goes. The man said and I quote" I saw my salary on a bottle of perfume today. So you are saying that someone out there smells like my salary." It's kind of funny but also sad at the same time. Where have we come today? There are people trying to live a normal life with what little amount they earn. And there are people using the same amount of money just to smell good.I bring up this to talk about financial freedom. What is financial freedom to you? Is it about having a certain amount of money that is required to have financial freedom or to have an amount of money which can potentially give you freedom in the future? To me, I will choose the second one. If I am happy with what I have and I am certain that it will continue to help me in the future too, then I have successfully achieved financial freedom. But most people these days are caught up with the thought of using luxurious thing and being able to continuously use it is financial freedom to them.Do you agree or disagree to this? Let me know your thoughts. [Just for context, I am not talking about holding money. I am talking about investments that could give me passive income that will continue to come in the future and give me financial freedom. As long as I can survive with that amount of money and not worry about the future, then it is financial freedom to me.]

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Financial freedom's description varies per person. Someone might say that it's financial freedom when they can eat everything they want and don't have to be problematic with their bills.The others could say that it is all about having all the material things that they never have. And the rest will just say it's all about having like lots of money that you can't imagine.What I've learned from the others about being financially free is that, they can do everything and they all have the time to do things that they want to do while earning passively.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Financial freedom is one of the topics that is always discussed when talking about money, business and investments, but you rarely find a precise definition of this wording, so everyone who talks about it simply talks about having enough money, but it means living a luxurious life without being forced to work, and here  job will be just a choice. Many people complain about their salaries, but what is more important than the salary and job is enhancing your assets so that it generates more and more money and profits for you easily.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Well, literally speaking, there are people whose knowledge and understanding of financial freedom is that when you have a lot of money, you can get everything you want materially. You don't worry about money.But the real financial freedom is that the money follows you, not that you follow the money. I hope you get my point about what we are talking about here. Another reason is that we have financial freedom because we have different businesses that produce money, so we never run out of money.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: There is a premise that says that financial freedom is when money is produced while you sleep, a traditional job will never give you financial freedom, but it is the red carpet to do so. When you read any author who deals with the subject, they tells you that you have to write a book, buy the rights to songs, a rights license to "...", in short there are many things that give you that financial freedom, that are not linked to traditional sources of income.

comments.author: Captain Corporate
comments.body: I would say there are lessons to be taken from it. I wouldn't want to be the person who bought a perfume that is worth your salary, but I would love to be the person who sold a perfume for your salary, now that is the person that is lucky in that transaction. Don't get me wrong, if you have 25 million dollars in the bank, and 200+ million networth, spending 10k dollars on a perfume is not a "stupid" move, some people think that it is, but they are so rich that it doesn't matter to them at all. I think it would make sense for those people to spend like that, because if they buy a perfume that you can buy too, then why did that become so rich? But the real person I envy a lot is not that rich person, its the perfume manufacturer, I would love to own a brand like that, more than be able to buy it.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: There are some things in this world that is unfathomable to us but is pretty common to others. Same goes to extravagant prices of common items such as this perfume. If I were to be asked on financial freedom, I'd say I'll see it as something that enables me to not think on how to fund my wants and needs for the next 5 years. Sounds so simple but that's basically what having more than enough money means. You don't have to worry about where will you be getting your money from for the next years and live comfortably without having to hold back on spending. Being rich is asking for too much, and while that per se is also financial freedom, I don't think a lot of people will ever be able to reach that.I'd rather be able to afford that perfume, and choose not to buy it rather than want to buy it but not have the means to do so.
